name: Sunday Morning Coffee: Autumn Edition
description:
I am compiling a list of credits! Check back soon -- so many wonderful & beautiful assets from here on itch.io!

Huge credit to this legend: Music by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

This is a game to be submitted to the #CozyAutumnJam2022!

Mouseclick on the game to activate the sounds!

Walk with the Arrow Keys and sip your drink with Space/Enter! Explore the little town on a quiet Sunday morning as the leaves fall and the butterflies flutter! Lots of little nooks and crannies to chill out in and enjoy the Glowing Autumn Spiced Ambience!
